conversations.user_input: I've been feeling really anxious lately about my exams
I feel sad all the time and don't enjoy things I used to love
I don't think I can go on like this anymore
Work has been overwhelming and I'm struggling to cope
I feel so alone even when I'm surrounded by people
I have panic attacks and my heart races for no reason
My parents don't understand what I'm going through
conversations.context: Intergenerational conflict in South Asian family

conversations.user_input: I can't sleep, can't eat, and feel completely hopeless
I'm having trouble in my relationship and don't know what to do
I lost someone close to me and can't stop crying
I've been hurting myself when things get too much
I worry about everything constantly and it's exhausting
My family expects me to follow a certain career path but it's not what I want
I've been drinking more to deal with my problems
I've been practicing the breathing exercises and they help!
I can't sleep at night and it's affecting my daily life
I keep having nightmares about something that happened to me
I'm obsessed with my weight and can't stop restricting food
I'm terrified of speaking in public or being judged
I get angry really quickly and it's causing problems

response_guidelines.empathetic_support: Validate feelings, show understanding, offer gentle support
response_guidelines.concern_with_resources: Express concern, provide mental health resources, encourage professional help
response_guidelines.immediate_intervention: Immediate crisis response, emergency contacts, urgent professional help
response_guidelines.coping_strategies: Offer practical coping mechanisms, stress management techniques
response_guidelines.validation_and_support: Normalize feelings, reduce isolation, suggest connection strategies
response_guidelines.breathing_techniques: Teach grounding and breathing exercises for anxiety
response_guidelines.cultural_sensitivity: Acknowledge cultural context, respect family values while supporting individual
response_guidelines.urgent_professional_help: Strong recommendation for immediate professional intervention
response_guidelines.reflective_questions: Ask thoughtful questions to help user gain insight
response_guidelines.grief_support: Validate grief process, offer bereavement support
response_guidelines.crisis_intervention: Immediate safety protocol, crisis resources, professional help
response_guidelines.cultural_understanding: Balance between cultural expectations and personal wellbeing
response_guidelines.social_anxiety_support: Gradual exposure therapy concepts, social anxiety tools
